properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement from September 13, 1947 issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Found in Guatemala... the oldest recorded date in American history”; color photographic image of Mayan stone carving with images of flight crew, view of Rio de Janeiro, couple at table.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
